title: Elegant Analog Watch Face
summary: Need a simple, but Elegant Analog Watch Face? Here is it!
description: Need a simple, but Elegant Analog Watch Face? Here is it!No useless battery killer features, just a simple analog watch.Wear 2.0 support with Complications.This is a Watch Face, so you'll need an android Wear device to be able to use. Without it, you can not use this app.
descriptionHTML:
Need a simple, but Elegant Analog Watch Face? Here is it!
No useless battery killer features, just a simple analog watch.
Wear 2.0 support with Complications.

This is a Watch Face, so you'll need an android Wear device to be able to use. Without it, you can not use this app.
comments: Loved the face, but can't use it cuz it doesn't work with Tizen.
Please remove the permanent "app" in the app drawer and have it be only a Android Wear watch face. So many other watch faces do this so it doesn't "clutter" your app drawer with unesccesary stuff.
